snippet: President Xi Jinping of China is set to make a state visit to the United States later this year, his first since becoming the top leader of Asia’s biggest economy.
abstract: Chinese Pres Xi Jinping will make his first state visit to United States later in 2015.

byline.contributor: Julie Hirschfeld Davis contributed reporting from Washington. Kiki Zhao contributed research from Beijing.

lead_paragraph: President Xi Jinping of China is set to make a state visit to the United States later this year, his first since becoming the top leader of Asia’s biggest economy.

headline.main: President Xi of China to Make State Visit to Washington
headline.print_headline: President Xi of China to Make State Visit to Washington
